root.name: Generator Rex: Agent of Providence
root.description: OverviewGenerator Rex: Agent of Providence is an action/adventure game developed by Virtuos and published by Activision for the Xbox 360, PlayStation 3, 3DS, DS, and Wii platforms.On September 18th, 2012 Generator Rex: Agent of Providence was added to the Xbox Live Games on Demand service for $19.99 USD.PlotIn Generator Rex: Agent of Providence every living being on the planet has been infected with Nanites. These Nanites have the power to turn whatever host they reside in into a monster called an EVO.The main character is Rex, who is a Nanite supercharged teenager which can morph parts of his body into various weapons, which are called builds.It is up to the player to take control of Rex and discover and defeat whoever is responsible for the EVO outbreak.
